name: FrogMate
description:
Play as a frog living a peaceful life among other frogs !
Hop everywhere to get some flies to eat, you are free to do whatever you want !
But don't forget to reunite with your mate at the end of the day, and try not to mistake them with another frog !

Each day will be more difficult than the previous one, with more frogs living and hoping everywhere with you.

This game was made for two different jams : the TriJam #169, with the theme "Overpopulation" and the Mini Jam 106, with the theme "Frogs" and the limitation "Limited Time"
